verses.roman:
ye kāle nimāñi paḍe dharaṇī-upare
vyathā yena nāhi lāge nimāñi-śarīre

synonyms: ye kāle—whenever; nimāñi—my son Nimāi; paḍe—falls down; dharaṇī-upare—on the surface of the earth; vyathā—pain; yena—as if; nāhi—not; lāge—touch; nimāñi-śarīre—the body of my son Nimāi.
translation: "Whenever Nimāi falls to the surface of the earth, please do not let Him feel any pain."
